ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_negcl | |- ( B e. CC -> -u B e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_sinadd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ -u B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` ( A + -u B ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u B ) ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` ( A + -u B ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u B ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_negsub | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A + -u B ) = ( A - B ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` ( A + -u B ) ) = ( sin ` ( A - B ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cosneg | |- ( B e. CC -> ( cos ` -u B ) = ( cos ` B ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( cos ` -u B ) = ( cos ` B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u B ) ) = ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_sinneg | |- ( B e. CC -> ( sin ` -u B ) = -u ( sin ` B ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` -u B ) = -u ( sin ` B ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u B ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) x. -u ( sin ` B ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_coscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 13 |  | #P_sincl | |- ( B e. CC -> ( sin ` B ) e. CC ) |
| 14 |  | #P_mulneg2 | |- ( ( ( cos ` A ) e. CC /\ ( sin ` B ) e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. -u ( sin ` B ) ) = -u ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 13, 14 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. -u ( sin ` B ) ) = -u ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) |
| 16 | 11, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u B ) ) = -u ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 16 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u B ) ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + -u ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |

| 19 |  | #P_coscl | |- ( B e. CC -> ( cos ` B ) e. CC ) |
| 20 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( ( sin ` A ) e. CC /\ ( cos ` B ) e. CC ) -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) e. CC ) |

| 23 | 12, 13, 22 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) e. CC ) |
| 24 | 21, 23 | #P_negsubd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + -u ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) - ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 25 | 17, 24 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u B ) ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) - ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 26 | 3, 5, 25 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` ( A - B ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) - ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
